author: Andy Blatchford
title: Canada’s Nunavut: Socially distanced, it’s one of the last places on Earth without coronavirus
description: In the Far North, warding off a virus that has encircled the globe is especially critical.
content: Tuberculosis is still a legitimate health threat across Nunavut, the medical system is limited and in so many cases families of 10 people or more live under one roof. Then theres its sheer remoteness much of its tiny population is scattered in small hamlets a… [+4422 chars]
